questions.question: How do you comment on a stability of a Nyquist plot?

answers.a: Greater the gain margin, less stable the system
answers.b: Lesser the gain margin, less stable the system
answers.c: Greater the gain margin, more stable the system
answers.d: Lesser the gain margin, more stable the system
